description:
We join Ekoda-chan for her day job, in this episode by director Takahashi Takeo (Citrus, Spice And Wolf) with Koshimizu Ami (Kill La Kill, Garo: Vanishing Line) as Ekoda-chan.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Rinshi!! Ekoda-chan: Kantoku to Ekoda-chan Ra no Zadankai - Takahashi Takeo x Koshimizu Ami
Rinshi!! Ekoda-chan: The Director and Ekoda-chan`s Naked Chat 9 - Takahashi Takeo x Koshimizu Ami
臨死!! 江古田ちゃん 監督と江古田ちゃん裸[ら]の座談会 高橋丈夫 x 小清水亜美
